properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 12 at 3:41AM EST until January 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to 1/4 NM or less. For the Small Craft Advisory,
seas 4 to 6 ft.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, from 1 PM this afternoon to
1 PM EST Monday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST
this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST MONDAY
